entry.data:

MOSTLY SUNNY

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY

LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
